text: Muḥmiṉkaḷāṉa āṇkaḷaiyum muḥmiṉkaḷāṉa peṇkaḷaiyum nīr pārkkum nāḷil avarkaḷuṭaiya pirakācam avarkaḷukku muṉṉālum, avarkaḷukku valappuṟattilum viraintu koṇṭirukkum, (appōtu avarkaḷai nōkki:)"Iṉṟu uṅkaḷukku naṉmārāyamāvatu cuvarkkattuc cōlaikaḷākum, avaṟṟiṉ kīḻē āṟukaḷ ōṭik koṇṭirukkum, avaṟṟil eṉṟeṉṟum taṅkiyiruṅkaḷ - itu tāṉ makattāṉa veṟṟiyākum" (eṉṟu kūṟappaṭum)
